mapper.select: SELECT m.uno, m.user_id, m.password, m.email, m.createAt, m.user_name, a.auth FROM tbl_member m LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member_auth a ON m.user_id = a.username WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (user_id, password, email, createAt, user_name) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, now(), #{userName})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET password = #{newPassword}, createAt = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
